title: The root schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

trips-id.description: This is a system generated id to make trips unique
trips-id.title: The trips-id schema

row_version.description: This is a system generated number that is used to control updates to the record.
row_version.title: The row_version schema

client_company_id.description: This is a system generated id that is used identify a customer
client_company_id.title: The client_company_id schema

client_company_name.description: Who the client is for the trip.
client_company_name.title: The client_company_name schema

load_weight.description: The amount of weight being moved.
load_weight.title: The load_weight schema

load_name.description: The customer supplied value to identify the load.
load_name.title: The load_name schema

estimated_pickup_date.description: When the vehicle should arrive at the pickup location.
estimated_pickup_date.title: The estimated_pickup_date schema

estimated_delivery_date.description: When the vehicle should deliver the load.
estimated_delivery_date.title: The estimated_delivery_date schema

estimated-delivery-days.description: How long in days to get to the delivery point.
estimated-delivery-days.title: The estimated-delivery-days schema

estimated_total_days.description: How long in days to complete the trip.
estimated_total_days.title: The estimated_total_days schema

estimated_return_date.description: Calculated date based on the estimated total days when the vehicle will returne.
estimated_return_date.title: The estimated_return_date schema

first_estimated_delivery_date.description: The date of the first date the shipment would be completed.
first_estimated_delivery_date.title: The first_estimated_delivery_date schema

external_bill_of_lading.description: This is an externally provided value for identification of a shipment for a trip.
external_bill_of_lading.title: The external_bill_of_lading schema

return_yard.description: The name of a return yard.
return_yard.title: The return_yard schema

trip_notes.description: This hold notes in reverse chronological order.
trip_notes.title: The trip_notes schema

trip_type.description: Is the trip INTERNAL or OUTSOURCED.
trip_type.title: The trip_type schema
